verses.verse: Forasmuch then <S%G3767>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> suffered3958, 5228, 2257 in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G3695>arm<s%> ye <S%G5210>yourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1771>mind<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> he that hath <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> hath <S%G3973>ceased<s%> from <S%G266>sin<s%>;

that <S%G1519><s%> <S%G980>ye<s%> no <S%G3371>longer<s%> should <S%G980>live<s%> the <S%G1954>rest<s%> <S%G5550>of<s%> your <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> to the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> past3928, 979 may suffice713, 2254 to have <S%G2716>wrought<s%> the <S%G2307>desire<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, and to have <S%G4198>walked<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%>, <S%G1939>lusts<s%>, <S%G3632>winebibbings<s%>, <S%G2970>revellings<s%>, <S%G4224>carousings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G111>abominable<s%> <S%G1495>idolatries<s%>:

wherein1722, 3739 they think it <S%G3579>strange<s%> that <S%G5216>ye<s%> <S%G4936>run<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1519>with<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G401>excess<s%> of <S%G810>riot<s%>, speaking evil of <S%G987>you<s%>:
who <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> to him that <S%G2192>is<s%> <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> this <S%G5124>end<s%> was the gospel <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they might be <S%G2919>judged<s%> indeed according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand<s%>: be <S%G4993>ye<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> of sound <S%G3525>mind<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G4993>sober<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4335>prayer<s%>:

according <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> hath <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G5486>gift<s%>, <S%G1247>ministering<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of the <S%G4164>manifold<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;

if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2980>speaketh<s%>, speaking <S%G5613>as<s%> it were <S%G3051>oracles<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G1487>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1247>ministereth<s%>, ministering <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2479>strength<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5524>supplieth<s%>: <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2904>dominion<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, think <S%G3579>it<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3579>strange<s%> <S%G5213>concerning<s%> the fiery <S%G4451>trial<s%> among <S%G1722>you<s%>, which cometh upon <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3986>prove<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, as though a strange <S%G3581>thing<s%> <S%G4819>happened<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> insomuch <S%G2526>as<s%> ye are <S%G2841>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s <S%G3804>sufferings<s%>, <S%G5463>rejoice<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> ye may <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> with exceeding <S%G21>joy<s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> ye are <S%G3679>reproached<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3107>blessed<s%> are <S%G3754>ye<s%>; because the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G987>of<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the Spirit of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G373>resteth<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3958>let<s%> <S%G3361>none<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G5406>murderer<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G2555>evil-doer<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a meddler in other <S%G244>men<s%>'s matters:

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a man suffer <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5546>Christian<s%>, let <S%G153>him<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G153>ashamed<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> let him <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>name<s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> is come for <S%G2917>judgment<s%> to <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it begin <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> shall be the <S%G5056>end<s%> of them that obey <S%G544>not<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> let them also that <S%G3958>suffer<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3908>commit<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G16>well-doing<s%> <S%G5613>unto<s%> a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2939>Creator<s%>.
